mapper.select:
SELECT , , , ESM.f_id as ESMid,ESM.f_name as ESMname,ESM.f_tel as ESMtel,date_format(ERO.f_sys0_upd_time,'%Y-%m-%d %T') as EROsys0UpdTime, EOHTEP.f_product_qty as EOHTEPproductQty, EOHTEP.f_product_price as EOHTEPproductPrice, EO.f_order_no as EOorderNo,EPR.f_flow_no as payFlowNo, IF ( ou1.f_real_name IS NULL OR ou1.f_real_name = '', ou1.f_id, ou1.f_real_name ) AS addMan, IF ( ou2.f_real_name IS NULL OR ou2.f_real_name = '', ou2.f_user_account, ou2.f_real_name ) AS updateMan FROM t_ebuy_refund_order ERO LEFT JOIN t_ebuy_delivery_order EDO ON ERO.t_ebuy_delivery_order_f_id = EDO.f_id AND ERO.f_sys0_del_state=0 LEFT JOIN t_ebuy_order EO ON EO.f_id = EDO.t_ebuy_order_f_id LEFT JOIN t_ebuy_pay_record EPR ON EPR.t_ebuy_order_f_id = EDO.t_ebuy_order_f_id LEFT JOIN t_ebuy_refund_order_product EROP ON ERO.f_id = EROP.t_ebuy_refund_order_f_id LEFT JOIN t_ebuy_supply_merchant ESM ON ERO.t_supply_merchant_f_id = ESM.f_id LEFT JOIN t_ebuy_order_has_t_ebuy_product EOHTEP ON EOHTEP.f_id = EROP.t_ebuy_order_has_t_ebuy_product_f_id left join t_user ou1 on ou1.f_id=ERO.f_sys0_add_user left join t_oms_user ou2 on ou2.f_id=ERO.f_sys0_upd_user
WHERE 1=1 AND ERO.f_sys0_del_state=0 and (EO.f_order_no like CONCAT('%',#{orderNo},'%') ) and (ERO.f_refund_status = #{refundStatus} ) and (ERO.f_pay_status = #{refundNo} ) and (ERO.f_buyer_id = #{buyerId} ) and (ERO.f_create_time = str_to_date(#{createTime},'%Y-%m-%d %T') )
and (ERO.f_create_time >= str_to_date(#{createTime_START},'%Y-%m-%d %T') )
and (ERO.f_create_time <= str_to_date(#{createTime_END},'%Y-%m-%d %T') )
and (ERO.f_sys0_upd_time = str_to_date(#{sys0UpdTime},'%Y-%m-%d %T') )
and (ERO.f_sys0_upd_time >= str_to_date(#{sys0UpdTime_START},'%Y-%m-%d %T') )
and (ERO.f_sys0_upd_time <= str_to_date(#{sys0UpdTime_END},'%Y-%m-%d %T') )
ORDER BY ERO.f_create_time DESC

SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT ERO.f_id) FROM t_ebuy_refund_order ERO LEFT JOIN t_ebuy_delivery_order EDO ON ERO.t_ebuy_delivery_order_f_id = EDO.f_id AND ERO.f_sys0_del_state=0 LEFT JOIN t_ebuy_order EO ON EO.f_id = EDO.t_ebuy_order_f_id LEFT JOIN t_ebuy_pay_record EPR ON EPR.t_ebuy_order_f_id = EDO.t_ebuy_order_f_id LEFT JOIN t_ebuy_refund_order_product EROP ON ERO.f_id = EROP.t_ebuy_refund_order_f_id LEFT JOIN t_ebuy_supply_merchant ESM ON ERO.t_supply_merchant_f_id = ESM.f_id LEFT JOIN t_ebuy_order_has_t_ebuy_product EOHTEP ON EOHTEP.f_id = EROP.t_ebuy_order_has_t_ebuy_product_f_id WHERE 1=1 AND ERO.f_sys0_del_state=0 and (EO.f_order_no like CONCAT('%',#{orderNo},'%') ) and (ERO.f_refund_status = #{refundStatus} ) and (ERO.f_pay_status = #{refundNo} ) and (ERO.f_buyer_id = #{buyerId} ) and (ERO.f_create_time = str_to_date(#{createTime},'%Y-%m-%d %T') )
and (ERO.f_create_time >= str_to_date(#{createTime_START},'%Y-%m-%d %T') )
and (ERO.f_create_time <= str_to_date(#{createTime_END},'%Y-%m-%d %T') )
and (ERO.f_sys0_upd_time = str_to_date(#{sys0UpdTime},'%Y-%m-%d %T') )
and (ERO.f_sys0_upd_time >= str_to_date(#{sys0UpdTime_START},'%Y-%m-%d %T') )
and (ERO.f_sys0_upd_time <= str_to_date(#{sys0UpdTime_END},'%Y-%m-%d %T') )

SELECT , , EP.f_name as EPproductname,EPT.f_type_name as EPTtypename, ESM.f_id as ESMid,ESM.f_name as ESMname,ESM.f_tel as ESMtel, EOHTEP.f_product_qty as EOHTEPproductQty, EOHTEP.f_product_price as EOHTEPproductPrice,ER.f_reason as REReason, date_format(ERO.f_sys0_upd_time,'%Y-%m-%d %T') as EROsys0UpdTime FROM t_ebuy_refund_order ERO INNER JOIN t_ebuy_refund_order_product EROP ON ERO.f_id = EROP.t_ebuy_refund_order_f_id INNER JOIN t_ebuy_supply_merchant ESM ON ERO.t_supply_merchant_f_id = ESM.f_id INNER JOIN t_ebuy_order_has_t_ebuy_product EOHTEP ON EOHTEP.f_id = EROP.t_ebuy_order_has_t_ebuy_product_f_id INNER JOIN t_ebuy_product_shelf EPS ON EOHTEP.t_ebuy_product_f_id = EPS.f_id INNER JOIN t_ebuy_product EP ON EP.f_id = EPS.t_ebuy_product_id INNER JOIN t_ebuy_product_type EPT ON EPT.f_id = EPS.t_ebuy_product_type_id INNER JOIN t_ebuy_refund_audit ER ON ERO.t_ebuy_refund_audit_f_id = ER.f_id WHERE 1=1 AND ERO.f_id=#{refundId}
